abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews all-Balanchine program performed by Suzanne Farrell Ballet at the Joyce Theater.
snippet: The way to watch Suzanne Farrell’s company is not to remember or reimagine her own performances but rather to see what her dancers have to reveal about Balanchine.
lead_paragraph: The way to watch Suzanne Farrell’s company is not to remember or reimagine her own performances but rather to see what her dancers have to reveal about Balanchine.

headline.main: A Stage Not Big Enough for a Legend
headline.print_headline: A Stage Not Big Enough for a Legend
headline.seo: Suzanne Farrell Ballet at Joyce Theater - Review
